title: Changed Password
body: Yesterday, I changed the password but my younger sister accidentally wrote something and can not sign in on my account now. I tried using email but my email is not valid. My email is bad because when I was running my account for about two years ago, I made a valid email but it did, and I did not know it was so important. I spent a lot of money on account. I had a lot of skins and champions so I would be sorry because I like to play League of Legends every day. I remained logged into my account ( RitoGames111 ) on the League of Legends page. If someone knows how to help, I would appreciate it. Thanks to all who try to help! And sorry for my bad English.

replies.body: If forgot my password isn't working because you can't access the email on file, you can still hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get back in. Make sure you stay signed out on the ticket website, and select "I need help recovering my account".
